title: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: When removing a working set, changes are immediately made.
OB:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view is filtered.
2. [Additional step needed]
SR:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view is filtered.
2. Open the working set dialog again, create a second working set, and delete the first one.
